doc.previous: where T is the multiplication operator
doc.after: This is the beginning of the vast research area of functional analysis called operator theory see also the spectral measure  There is also an analogous spectral theorem for bounded normal operators on Hilbert spaces The only difference in the conclusion is that now may be complex valued
